channel.title: How do i make my self as an ADMIN (508)
channel.description:
i did this in login.java and still wont work
if (p.username.equals("Wwe Justin")) { p.rights = 2;
Plz help

item.title: How do i make my self as an ADMIN (508)
item.dc:creator: @keo_pkz keo pkz
item.description:
@keo_pkz wrote:

Characters/ {username}/ find / character rights/
0=player
1=mod
2=admin
3=co-owner / owner

item.title: How do i make my self as an ADMIN (508)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

andrew4444:

Make all your letters lower case, delete your account, recreate your account, make sure all other files are coded with your name in lower case letters, and try then. My source did the same thing, When it checks the code its case sensitive most likely.

Correct, when you put “equals” It checks the case but if you replace that with “equalsIgnoreCase” It wont.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my self as an ADMIN (508)
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

hellpk7:

go into characters and find your name and open it. then u should see a bunch of stuff about your character and find the thing that says rights=0 change the 0 into a 2 for admin 1 for mod

In the char folder theres only backup folder which has nuffin it, Mainsave folder which i cant open casue its DAT file and an ip Txt document

Read full topic
